master-use-flags.title: Master Override
master-use-flags.description: Toggle this off to use Launch Darkly instead.

enable-payment-settings.title: Enable Payment Settings
enable-payment-settings.description: Enables the payment settings interface (applies to nav item, routes and components).

enable-payment-settings-dashboard.title: Enable Payment Settings Dashboard
enable-payment-settings-dashboard.description: Enables the payment settings dashboard interface.

enable-reports-v3.title: Enable Reports v3
enable-reports-v3.description: v3 updates to reports. Falls back to v2 then v1 in that order

enable-payto-only.title: Enable PayTo Only
enable-payto-only.description: Enables the PayTo only environment for PayTo only features.

enable-kratos-prototype.title: Enable Kratos Prototype
enable-kratos-prototype.description: Enables Ory Kratos Prototype for dev access.

enable-bpay-crn-generation.title: Enable new BPay interface
enable-bpay-crn-generation.description: Allow customers paying via BPay to generate CRNs on demand

enable-bpay-simulated-payment.title: Allow simulated BPay payments
enable-bpay-simulated-payment.description: Strictly admin-only flag that lets us simulate BPay payments for testing

enable-simulated-payment.title: Allow simulated payments
enable-simulated-payment.description: Strictly admin-only flag that lets us simulate payments for testing

enable-move-people.title: Move Users and Customers
enable-move-people.description: Allow Users and Customers to be moved between nodes (merchants)

enable-self-registration-referrals.title: Allow signup referrals
enable-self-registration-referrals.description: Allow self registration (a.k.a signup) referrals via /signup/_insert_referral_name_here_

enable-assign-limited-access.title: Enable Limited Access Assignment
enable-assign-limited-access.description: Superadmins get an option to set user accounts to Limited Access (readonly)

enable-new-agreement-flow.title: Enable New Agreement Flow
enable-new-agreement-flow.description: Enables the NPP payment request structure and allows action requests like adhoc payments and agreement amendments

enable-new-halt-resume.title: Enable New Halt & Resume
enable-new-halt-resume.description: Enable new halt and resume feature driven via actions system.

enable-new-payments.title: Enable New Payments
enable-new-payments.description: Enables the new payments cards for Brian

enable-live-proving.title: Enable Live Proving
enable-live-proving.description: Enable the experience of a user with a live proving account.

enable-client-fido2.title: Enable Client Fido2
enable-client-fido2.description: Enable the Fido2 PIN replacement in Client.

enable-cashflow-as-processed.title: Enable Cashflow as Processed
enable-cashflow-as-processed.description: Cashflow uses processed instead of completed.

use-local-provider-iframe.title: Use Local Provider Iframe
use-local-provider-iframe.description: Use the local provider iframe instead of dev.

enable-linkless-onboarding.title: Enable Linkless Onboarding
enable-linkless-onboarding.description: Enable linkless onboarding flow in the client app.

enable-help-id-verification.title: Enable Help (ID & Verification)
enable-help-id-verification.description: Enable help (ID & Verification) menu item and route in the client app.
